question: What is the theme of the book Arthashastra, written by Kautilya?
option4: Play about life of Chandragupta Maurya
explanation: Arthashastra is considered one of the most sophisticated literature which has ever been produced in India. The Arthashastra summarises the political thoughts of Chandragupta Mauryaâ€™s chief minister Kautilya or the basic principles of Government.
